body: why is satori the size of a fucking wrecking ball

Everything will be fiiine, because MAGIC RIGHT? and not just any magic...HENTAI MAGIC!
Seriously though, I remember skimming across this yeeears ago browsing the belly expansion tag on another website. Never would have thought it was non-rape. Consent-given tentacle modification...this is an idea for hentai that could go places.
